description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. Fixed the issue where the auto-log display function was active in the layout editing interface.  
2. Fixed lag when clicking the settings page before the control layout finished loading.  
3. Fixed potential discrepancies between directly entered memory sizes and UI displays.  
4. Adjusted layouts related to renderer & driver selection.  
5. Modified the layout of the offline skin settings page.  
6. Fixed an issue where the offline skin page might fail to open.

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.修复自动显示日志功能在编辑布局界面生效的问题
2.修复控制布局未加载完成点击设置页面卡顿的问题
3.修复直接输入的内存大小与UI显示可能不符的问题
4.调整渲染器&驱动选择相关布局
5.调整设置离线皮肤页面布局
6.修复离线皮肤页面可能无法打开的问题
